about_the_game:
The doors to hell have been opened. The Earth has become a battlefield among 10 infernal armies. Bael is the most feared among all demons from hell, and set out in an insane crusade to conquer the Earth for himself.

A scrolling shooter game, with 10 stages with plenty of action, violence and blood. During the gameplay, those who enjoy horror movies will find several references to movies like "Evil Dead, "The Burning", "The Suckling", among others. A game with great playability, several hidden secrets and different endings.

Along the game, the player will be able to buy several items like magic, life, continues and save points, and will also be able to find lots of secrets.

A game to keep the player on the edge on the seat from beginning to end.

name: Hell Pages

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 duo 2.9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9500 gt
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 duo 2.9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9500 gt
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: The doors to hell have been opened. The Earth has become a battlefield among 10 infernal armies. Bael, the most feared among all demons, set out in an insane crusade to conquer the Earth for himself in this scrolling shooter game, with 10 stages with plenty of action, violence and blood.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
